Agree in general we prefer one feature/fix per PR There will be a separate PR for pooling fix thx Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

________________________________ From: bddppq <notifications@github.com> Sent: Saturday, September 15, 2018 4:47 PM To: pytorch/pytorch Cc: Yeh, Peter; Mention Subject: Re: [pytorch/pytorch] [Caffe2] Improve python tests for HIP device (#11410) @bddppq requested changes on this pull request. Yeah better to split the pool fix separated. We don't want to touch the python api part at this point, there is on-going work to unify cuda_gpu_id, hip_gpu_id and numa_node_id to device_id. — You are receiving this because you were mentioned. body_text:
Agree in general we prefer one feature/fix per PR
There will be a separate PR for pooling fix thx

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>
…
________________________________
From: bddppq <notifications@github.com>
Sent: Saturday, September 15, 2018 4:47 PM
To: pytorch/pytorch
Cc: Yeh, Peter; Mention
Subject: Re: [pytorch/pytorch] [Caffe2] Improve python tests for HIP device (#11410)


@bddppq requested changes on this pull request.

Yeah better to split the pool fix separated. We don't want to touch the python api part at this point, there is on-going work to unify cuda_gpu_id, hip_gpu_id and numa_node_id to device_id.

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
Reply to this email directly, view it on GitHub<#11410 (review)>, or mute the thread<https://github.com/notifications/unsubscribe-auth/AAqt_1PZorgYjjFKz7UudOZWnWsamMGjks5ubZGBgaJpZM4Wflbj>.
body:
Agree in general we prefer one feature/fix per PR
There will be a separate PR for pooling fix thx

Get Outlook for iOS<https://aka.ms/o0ukef>

________________________________
From: bddppq <notifications@github.com>
Sent: Saturday, September 15, 2018 4:47 PM
To: pytorch/pytorch
Cc: Yeh, Peter; Mention
Subject: Re: [pytorch/pytorch] [Caffe2] Improve python tests for HIP device (#11410)


@bddppq requested changes on this pull request.

Yeah better to split the pool fix separated. We don't want to touch the python api part at this point, there is on-going work to unify cuda_gpu_id, hip_gpu_id and numa_node_id to device_id.

—
You are receiving this because you were mentioned.
